title: How do you trigger aftershock on Rammus?
body:
Is it the Q knockup, or the taunt?

Thanks.

replies.body:
Thanks but another question.

What counts as immobilizing an opponent? Taunt doesn't seem to be a hard CC so is taunt always counted as immobilization?

Immobilizing an oponent means that the oponent can't issue movement commands. In other words, right clicking to move won't make that champ move towards that direction, for the duration of the effect.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Crowd_control
Read here about immobilization cc.

Thank you.

That's very useful info.
